questions.question: Cyberstalking is harassment committed online, especially on social media?

The IP address is the identification number of every device connected to a network using the Internet?
Digital identity refers to all our digital traces on the Internet (what we like, share, etc.)?
An influencer is a person who influences the decisions of their followers, including purchasing decisions?
Creating a Google alert for your name is?
options: A good idea to know if someone is speaking ill of you online
